content:
/>
II.ii.2.B.4.c
.
Handling Photocopies of Service Records
Follow the instructions in the table below upon receipt of
photocopies
of service records.
If the photocopies were submitted by ...
Then ...
a claimant or the appointed power of attorney (POA)
follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 2.A.2.a
.
an entity or someone
other than
a claimant or the appointed POA
if duplicates, dispose of the records in accordance with
RCS VB-1, Part I, Item number 13-052.100
, or
if not duplicates, follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 2.B.1.b
.
Important
:  RACCs have no authority to dispose of original service records.
Reference
:  For more information on RACC storage of original service records, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, 2.B.4.a
and
b
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Restricted Records Storage and Control
citation: Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B
